name: Margaritas (or Sidecars or Sours) Recipe (for a Crowd)
description: This is a versatile recipe, based on classic proportions for a traditional sour. A sour is a mix of spirits, triple sec (you can also use Cointreau or Grand Marnier), and citrus juice. Be sure to make this drink the day of the party—any earlier, and the citrus juice will spoil.
recipeIngredient: 13 ounces liquor (tequila, cognac, rum, vodka, bourbon, etc.)
6 ounces bottled or filtered water (something neutral, not mineral water)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a funnel, pour all ingredients into bottle. Shake well to combine all ingredients. Close bottle and chill until service. Shake well again before serving.
